name: Seriously of all the movies that should have a remake!!
reviewBody: Instead of pumping out remakes of cult classics such as hairspray..With all the technology and special effects we have why don't they remake the 70s classic JAWS!!!!Id go see it!!!Hollywood keeps on making sequels like HOSTLE 2 or the hills have eyes 2...come on people we deserve better then that from Hollywood!!!!and while we are at it....where is the live action movie of the Thundercats...Its 2007 and they just made a Nancy Drew movie!!!Jaws would be the perfect movie to remake..Think about the all star cast you can get. Also the fun we could have with CGI. I would like to meet the people who make these decisions. I mean John Travaolta in drag the world can definitely do without.
